qrs vf_cnyvaqebzr(vachgAhzore):

       erghea Snyfr

   # svaq gur ahzore bs qvtvgf va gur vachgAhzore
   qvi = 1
   juvyr (vachgAhzore / qvi >= 10):
       qvi *= 10

   # purpx vs gur zbfg fvtavsvpnag naq yrnfg fvtavsvpnag qvtvgf zngpu
   juvyr (vachgAhzore != 0):
       # pbzcner svefg naq ynfg qvtvgf
       svefgqvtvg = vachgAhzore // qvi
       ynfgqvtvg =  vachgAhzore % 10
       vs svefgqvtvg != ynfgqvtvg:
           erghea Snyfr

       # erzbir gur zbfg naq yrnfg fvtavsvpnag qvtvg bs vachgAhzore
       vachgAhzore = (vachgAhzore % qvi) // 10

       # erqhpr qvi ol n snpgbe bs 2,  fvapr 2 qvtvgf
       # jrer erzbirq
       qvi = qvi // 100
   erghea Gehr
